name: misc-utils-of-mine-generic
description: Miscellaneous utilities for JavaScript/TypeScript that I often use

scripts.prettier: npx prettier  --write --arrow-parens avoid --parser typescript --use-tabs false --no-semi true --single-quote true --tab-width 2 --trailing-comma none --end-of-line lf --prose-wrap preserve --print-width 120  --jsx-bracket-same-line true "src/**/*.ts*"
scripts.lint: npm run organizeImports && npm run format
scripts.all: npm run clean && npm run prettier && npm run format &&  npm run build && npm run test-js && npm run test && npm run docs
scripts.all-publish: npm run all && git commit -a -m "version patch" && npm version patch && npm publish

author: Sebasti√°n Gurin
